Episodes.Title: Crushamondo
Episodes.Plot:
Sadie falls for geek-turned-hottie Joe, but how can she compete with trog-face Chloe? 

By proving to him that she's not a grease monkey in overalls. Cue one of Kit's makeovers.

Episodes.Title: Robobootylicious
Episodes.Plot:
Sadie fixes it for Dede's mum to come to the JLS concert with her, and gets Steve to help Dede with her robot wars fight night on the same night. 

Then Dede's mum turns out to be even less cool than Steve, so she tries to get her dad back, by sabotaging Dede's robot so he won't have to help her any more.

Episodes.Title: Friendalicious
Episodes.Plot: Sadie thinks that Kit has traded her in as his BFF for Chloe. So, she invents a cooler, richer, better best friend - and then has to have him meet Kit!

Episodes.Title: Slumberlicious
Episodes.Plot:
Sadie is hosting a slumber party and wants all the sassy, A-list members of her school to be invited. (despite many being anything but her friends).

Episodes.Title: Tidylicious
Episodes.Plot:
Sadie becomes sick of all the mess the boys leave behind - not even giving a thought to the fact she's caused half of it. Sadie rallies them all to assault the mess - but with rather poor results. So she decides it's time for a housekeeper - against her dad's wishes. 

Meanwhile Dede manages to construct a rather lethal looking M261 70mm Hydra rocket - but Jake and Danny nick it and replace the HEDP submunition filled warhead with custard..... shame, the original would have definately cleared th

Episodes.Title: Fashiontastic
Episodes.Plot: Sadie discovers she has no fashion sense when Kit lets her design a costume.

Episodes.Title: Partylicious
Episodes.Plot: Sadie's thinks she is too old to have a birthday organised by her dad, so she tries to help Kit and Dede organise her own surprise party.

Episodes.Title: Pompomtastic
Episodes.Plot: Sadie's thinks she is too old to have a birthday organised by her dad, so she tries to help Kit and Dede organise her own surprise party.

Episodes.Title: Cherylistic
Episodes.Plot: Sadie accidentally promises to get an A-list celeb for a Save-the-Y-Club concert - so she ends trying, then lying, then finally impersonating Cheryl Cole herself.

Episodes.Title: Tiptastic
Episodes.Plot: Sadie needs more money, so she becomes a roller-skating waitress in the Y - only to see Chloe walk off with her hard-earned cash.

Episodes.Title: Promalicious
Episodes.Plot: Desperate to shine at the Y prom, Sadie infiltrates Kit's Glee-style show-choir and steals the show

Episodes.Title: Girltastic, Part 1
Episodes.Plot: A journalist from a major teen magazine comes to visit to see if Sadie is good enough to be Tweenager of the Year.

Episodes.Title: Girltastic, Part 2
Episodes.Plot: When Steve and Keith discover that Sadie's main competition for Girltastic Girl of the Year is Whitney, the captain of the Cheerups, they have their work cut out to convince the journo that Sadie is better - but things go wrong when Steve and Whitney have a fight in the Y.
